name: Who is META!?
description:
Meta bags was started not long ago in Philadelphia Pa, by a bike messenger and an illustrator. Now its getting a new lease on life in Orlando Florida, building high quality, super comfortable, incredibly durable and functional sling-style messenger bags backpack utility belts and accessories!


META only uses the highest quality materials we can get our hands on:
+Dupont Cordura Coated Nylon outer.
+18oz Rubberized truck tarp lining & Pack cloth inner
+The smoothest & strongest webbing and only the highest quality plastic hardware
+All bags are handmade by scratch in our downtown
Orlando studio, by META.

Bags retail @ $250 but online orders at this time are $225, comparatively a great price!

Contact us at: 

Email: MetaBags@Gmail.com
Dom:  321.305.1255
Geoff: 321.276.6968

name: Original Meta Messenger Bag
description:
Our standard Meta messenger bag right now is kinda big at 15 x 10 inches at about 13 inches tall. The top corners are 28 inches across.

- Meta bags come with the compression straps and fully padded straps and back pannel.

- Strap extenders, double outside pockets, and inside organizer ALL standard as well.

- We handmake everything in our studio w a three layer main construction ( Cordura 1000, rubberized truck tarp, and pack cloth) with a ballistic nylon base.

They're pretty gnarly, totally weather-proof, there's not much you can't do with one.

...and all for $250

***Inside Padded Laptop Pockets are an additional $10.00 email Metabags@Gmail.com with your laptop dimensions for a perfect snug fit.

Metabags.Blogspot.Com

name: Meta Super Backpack
description:
This Meta backpack has it all!


-Accessory straps on both shoulders. Double D ring adjustments (chest strap keeps the bag from pulling your shoulders back when carrying a lot of weight.) 

-padded everything.

-A zipper on side panel that enters main compartment. Now you can get inside your bag without having to fully remove your backpack!

- A side pocket. Two inside pockets that open from the top AND the side for easy access from the inside of the bag and the zipper side panel.

- Removable main straps can release from the bottom to maximize your options for carrying MORE MORE MORE.

-  A flap extender and an EXTRA flap extender that folds from the other for items that are TALLER TALLER TALLER.

- Extra male side release buckle to clip the flap down without having to remove the entire strap.

- Extra male end of the side release buckle to attach to main strap without removing the top clip

- Huge front pocket and more clips and extenders to really transform your bag to your personal needs

*Check out the Flickr for a closer look http://www.flickr.com/photos/43369914@N05/

Metabags@Gmail.com

name: New Meta Utility Belt
description:
Keeping up with Meta's style the Meta hip pouch is a trasformer just like our sling bags.

- First we got the easy access celly holder.

- Three flat pockets up front. Great for your wallet/pens or whatever you can fit
- We gave you four strips of velcro to keep that flap down nice and snug. No more losing your patch kit when youre hopping up a curb. 

- And of course an integrated U-lock holster. 

- Extra strap retention system we use on our sling bags to cinch the bag tight when empty. Like the messenger bags, transforming to your needs every time.

***Check out this blog post for detailed pictures - http://metabags.blogspot.com/2009/08/new-meta-utility-belt.html

Metabags@gmail.com

name: U-Lock Key Wristband Jawn
description:
Hop from job to job bar to bar with ease.

***We also have U-lock belt holsters for $8 bucks. Def down to cut you a deal on purchasing both of the homeboys together
